div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActMedicalServiceCode

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
CodeDisplayDefinition
_ActMedicalServiceCodeActMedicalServiceCodeGeneral category of medical service provided to the patient during their encounter.

description.value: General category of medical service provided to the patient during their encounter.
